GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit cfea428030be836d79a7690968232bb7fa4410f1. For more details please see the references link.
